entries.title: Google’s Fuchsia OS was one of the hardest hit by last week’s layoffs
entries.description: Fuchsia lost 16 percent of its employees, while the rest of Google cut 6 percent.

entries.title: iPadOS 15 drops support for newer iPads in 15.7.3 security update
entries.description: 2014's iPad Air 2 and 2015's iPad mini 4 will continue to get iPadOS 15 updates.

entries.title: Dragon Age: Dreadwolf loses another veteran BioWare producer
entries.description: After 19-year stint, Mass Effect's Mac Walters is latest to leave company.

entries.title: iOS 16.3 and macOS Ventura 13.2 add hardware security key support
entries.description: Plus, Rapid Security Response rolls out to macOS.

entries.title: Scientists identify rare lead compounds in Rembrandt’s The Night Watch
entries.description: Work is part of research and conservation project Operation Night Watch.

entries.title: For Facebook addicts, clicking is more important than facts or ideology
entries.description: Once clicking "share" becomes habitual, the content of what's shared matters less.

entries.title: Microsoft will stop selling Windows 10 on January 31, but workarounds remain
entries.description: So far, Windows 10 and Windows 11 product keys have been interchangeable.

entries.title: OpenAI and Microsoft announce extended, multi-billion-dollar partnership
entries.description: Reported $10 billion outlay follows investments from Microsoft in 2019, 2021.

entries.title: Ransomware victims are refusing to pay, tanking attackers’ profits
entries.description: The drying up of payouts is forcing attackers to hunt bigger game and re-extort.

entries.title: This 32,000-mile Ocean Race has yachts doing research along the way
entries.description: The yachts will sample ocean gases and microplastic levels along their route.

entries.title: Wanted (by scientists): Dead birds and bats, felled by renewables
entries.description: Collecting, studying, and storing the carcasses, scientists say, can unlock new insights.

entries.title: Supreme Court seeks Biden admin input on Texas and Florida social media laws
entries.description: SCOTUS wants to hear from US gov't before deciding whether to take up the cases.

entries.title: Dictionary biz finally infiltrates gaming as Merriam-Webster buys Quordle
entries.description: Finally, definitions and four-at-a-time word guessing on a single website.

entries.title: 2023 MacBook Pro review: A refined second generation
entries.description: The M2 Pro and Max and improved connectivity headline Apple’s laptop refresh.

entries.title: SpaceX may perform a wet dress rehearsal of its Starship launch system today
entries.description: If at first you don't succeed, cryo, cryo again.

entries.title: M2 Pro Mac mini review: Apple’s Goldilocks desktop for semi-professionals
entries.description: Outstanding power efficiency is a highlight of this in-betweener desktop.

entries.title: Kyle and Andrew sneak through The Last of Us’ by-the-book second episode
entries.description: After more than 2 hours, it feels like the show is finally done setting things up.
